title: Saints Row®: The Third™
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Russian.  Years after taking Stilwater for their own, the Third Street Saints have evolved from street gang to household brand name, with Saints sneakers, Saints energy drinks and Johnny Gat bobble head dolls all available at a store near you. The Saints are kings of Stilwater, but their celebrity status has not gone unnoticed. The Syndicate, a legendary criminal fraternity with pawns in play all over the globe, has turned its eye on the Saints and demands tribute. Refusing to kneel to the Syndicate, you take the fight to a new city, playing out the most outlandish gameplay scenarios ever seen. Strap it on. The Saints are kings of Stilwater, but their celebrity status has not gone unnoticed. The Syndicate, a legendary criminal fraternity with pawns in play all over the globe, has turned its eye on the Saints and demands tribute. Refusing to kneel to the Syndicate, you take the fight to Steelport, a once-proud metropolis reduced to a struggling city of sin under Syndicate control.  Take a tank skydiving, call in a satellite-targeted airstrike on a Mexican wrestling gang, and defend yourself against a highly-trained military force using only a sex toy in the most out- landish gameplay scenarios ever seen, igniting a city-wide war that will set Steelport on fire. Strap it on.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Saints Row®: The Third™
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Russian. childDownloads.title: Steelport Theme
childDownloads.description: Download this Saints Row: The Third theme and explore the city of Steelport on your dashboard.

childDownloads.title: Initiation Station
childDownloads.description: Create, share, and download the most outlandish characters you've ever seen, then upload them for play in Saints Row: The Third.  Inside every Sinner is a Saint.

childDownloads.title: Killbane: The Walking Apocalypse Trailer
childDownloads.description: As the Saints begin their Steelport takeover, nothing bigger stands in their way than Killbane. As a professional wrestler, earned the name The Walking Apocalypse after ending the career of Angel De La Muerte, his former tag-team partner. He now leads the Luchadores, ‘roided-out wrestlers with a stranglehold on the Steelport weapons trade. Angel teamed with the Saints, and together they’ll take on Killbane, in the ring and in the streets, in a battle royale that will leave Steelport shaking.

childDownloads.title: Deckers.Die Trailer
childDownloads.description: The Deckers… elite cybercriminals… hackers… unrelenting online gamers. Upon arriving in Steelport, the Saints find their bank accounts wiped out by a Deckers cyber-attack. There’s only one thing to do: hack into the Deckers user-net and shut down the network… permanently. In this world, Deckers mastermind Matt Miller is a virtual god, capable of altering physics and unleashing his own deadly avatar. Are you ready to f*** s*** up in virtual reality?

childDownloads.title: Logo & City Pack
childDownloads.description: This set of 5 Gamer Pictures features various Saints Row: The Third logos and shots of Steelport.

childDownloads.title: Opposition Pic Pack
childDownloads.description: This set of 5 Gamer Pictures features various members of the opposing gangs found in the city of Steelport.

childDownloads.title: Pimps and Gimps Trailer
childDownloads.description: The Syndicate is comprised of 'roided-out wrestlers, emo cyberpunks, and well-dressed Europeans. STAG is armed with hover jets, jet bikes, and a flying aircraft carrier. To take Steelport for the Saints and defeat your most dangerous/ridiculous enemies yet, you're going to have to get creative. Assemble your team of pimps, gimps, zombies and, most importantly, the mayor of Steelport himself. Strap it on.

childDownloads.title: Shock and Awesome Trailer
childDownloads.description: Terrorist insurgents? Been there. Unruly Taliban? Done that. The Third Street Saints? Now that’s a challenge. The only military force in the world capable of answering the call is STAG, the Special Tactical Anti Gang unit, outfitted with hover jets, speeder bikes, laser tanks, and one hell-of-a flying aircraft carrier. See STAG for yourself in the new Shock and Awesome trailer.

childDownloads.title: Saints Row®: The Third™  - Strap it on!
childDownloads.description: In Saints Row®: The Third™, the world is yours for the taking. The Syndicate, the legendary criminal fraternity with influence across the globe, thinks otherwise. In the “Strap It On” announcement trailer, the Saints encounter their new enemy for the first time, igniting a bloody war for power that will set the city of Steelport on fire.  “Strap It On” with the announcement trailer for Saints Row®: The Third™.

childDownloads.title: The Syndication Trailer
childDownloads.description: Do you have any idea who you’re f#$%ing with? The Syndicate sure doesn’t in this all new gameplay trailer for Saints Row: The Third. Captured by the leader of the Syndicate, Phillipe Loren and his chief lieutenants Kiki DeWynter, and Viola DeWynter (voiced by actress Sasha Grey), the Saints are made an offer they can only refuse… and so begins the war in Steelport. Strap it on.

childDownloads.title: The Wide World of Genki Trailer
childDownloads.description: This Fall, experience the phenomenon that is taking the world by storm: Professor Genki’s Super Ethical Reality Climax, Steelport’s most popular survival game show in Saints Row: The Third. Contestants from around the globe compete for cash, prizes, and their own lives in games of death and dismemberment. It’s fun for the whole family, watch it now!

childDownloads.title: Angel's Luchador Mask
childDownloads.description: Wear the mask of Angel De LaMuerte and win back your pride.

childDownloads.title: Bloodsucker Pack
childDownloads.description: Keep the cash flowin' with the Bloodsucker Pack. You'll earn respect and get cash bonuses  but it doesn't stop there!  You also get payments, money drop, and the ability to regain health through your human shields with The Dracula skill.

childDownloads.title: De LaMuerte Gym Sweatshirt
childDownloads.description: Join the De LaMuerte Gym today and receive this custom sweatshirt.

childDownloads.title: De LaMuerte Gym Sweatshirt
childDownloads.description: Join the De LaMuerte Gym today and receive this custom sweatshirt.

childDownloads.title: Decker Female Outfit
childDownloads.description: Become a proud member of the Deckers with this outfit.

childDownloads.title: Decker Male Outfit
childDownloads.description: Become a proud member of the Deckers with this outfit.

childDownloads.title: Explosive Combat Pack
childDownloads.description: Throw on your combat gear and add a weapon to your arsenal with the Explosive Combat Pack. The M2 Grenade Launcher sends a plethora of mass explosions right at your enemy, and the Future Soldier Outfit is  perfect for any battle.

childDownloads.title: Funtime! Pack
childDownloads.description: Go super ballistic with the FunTime! Pack which gives you a new weapon, vehicle, and outfit. Terrorize your enemies by sucking them up and shooting them out with the Genki Man-A-Pult! Pull the trigger on the Mollusk Launcher and unleash the power of an exploding, mind-controlling octopus! And make sure you put on your FunTime! Outfit, because who doesn't want to look like Professor Genki!

childDownloads.title: Furry Outfit
childDownloads.description: For those of you that need to be leashed into a new outfit, try this on for size.

childDownloads.title: Furry Outfit
childDownloads.description: For those of you that need to be leashed into a new outfit, try this on for size.

childDownloads.title: Gangstas In Space
childDownloads.description: If you own Saints Row: The Third Season Pass DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. A new movie is being shot in Steelport and you're the star! Join with your co-star, Jenny, to fight the alien invasion for the film Gangstas In Space. With spaceships and alien weaponry, this retro-style film is sure to be a hit! Saints Row: The Third game required; sold separately.

childDownloads.title: Genki Girl Pack
childDownloads.description: Drive in Genki Girl style with this assortment of vehicles. Sad Panda sports a dune buggy, Angry Tiger has her motorcycle, and Sexy Kitten drives a special sports car. Each of these rides is themed after the girls themselves, and pack a deadly surprise!

childDownloads.title: Genki Pic Pack
childDownloads.description: This set of 5 Gamer Pictures features everyone's favorite game show, Professor Genki's Super Ethical Reality Climax!

childDownloads.title: Genki Time Shirt
childDownloads.description: ETHICAL.

childDownloads.title: Genki Time Shirt
childDownloads.description: ETHICAL.

childDownloads.title: Genkibowl VII
childDownloads.description: If you own Saints Row: The Third Season Pass DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again.  Professor Genki invites you to be the main contestant on Genkibowl VII! Featuring games themed by the Genki Girls Angry Tiger, Sexy Kitten and Sad Panda, see if you can beat Genkibowl and gain them and reporter Tammy Tolliver as homies! Saints Row: The Third game required; sold separately.

childDownloads.title: Horror Pack
childDownloads.description: Join the ranks of the most terrifying dreams with these horrific costumes. The flesh-eating Zombie Outfit will have everyone you meet running for their lives. Even more horrifying is the Slasher Outfit--it's all of your worst nightmares rolled into one. And no Horror Pack would be complete without a full Werewolf Outfit that might just have you howling at the moon.

childDownloads.title: Invincible Pack
childDownloads.description: More cheats than you'll know what to do with.  Never worry about dying or running out of ammo!  Unlock the Get Down Cheat that makes you ultra limber. Super Saints gives you better guns and better health while Ultimate Clip ensures that you're always ready to fire. Get Infinite Mass for your vehicle plus Super Explosions and you'll be ready for anything!
